mapper.select: select uf.username, uf.nick_name, s.name, uf.email, (select login_time from users_front_login_session where user_id=uf.id ORDER BY id desc limit 1) login_time from company_live_static_detail c, student s, users_front uf where c.user_id=uf.id and c.user_id=s.user_id and c.class_lesson_id = #{classLessionId} and uf.mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT e.id,e.lesson_name FROM class_type a INNER JOIN class_type_module_relation b ON a.id = b.class_type_id INNER JOIN class_module c ON b.module_id = c.id INNER JOIN class_module_no_onsale cmno ON cmno.module_id = c.id INNER JOIN class_module_no cmn ON cmn.id = cmno.module_no_id INNER JOIN class_module_lesson e ON cmn.id = e.module_no_id WHERE a.id =#{classTypeId} AND cmno.classtype_id = a.id and cmno.default_flag = 1 and a.origin_type=0 and c.del_flag = 0 and e.del_flag = 0

select uf.username, uf.nick_name, s.name, uf.email, (select login_time from users_front_login_session where user_id=uf.id ORDER BY id desc limit 1) login_time, cml.lesson_name from company_live_static_detail c, student s, users_front uf, class_module_lesson cml where c.user_id=uf.id and c.user_id=s.user_id and c.class_lesson_id=cml.id and c.class_lesson_id = #{classLessionId} and uf.mobile = #{mobile}
